CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT puts CHI down on the floor as they enter the room . CHI immediately plays with the jack+in+the+box

INV enters the room and then leaves while Small Scale Activity takes place and re-enters at 12:17:15 . INV explains Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table . INV lets CHI keep them string of beads from Small Scale but clears away all the other toys
